docs.text:
Overview


Finvu is providing a FIP simulator based on the 
ReBIT API specs
. We have also provided an API for inputting source data for FIP for different 
FIType
 . Kindly refer to the details of the FIP Data API to know more. 


We are trying to keep upto the pace by implementing latest Rebit API specs, however if there any issues, do drop us a note at 
info@cookiejar.co.in


Version


Currently the FIP simulator adheres to the ReBit specs version 1.0.1


API Key Request


In order to use the FIP API an api key is required to be passed. 


Please send an email to 
info@cookiejar.co.in
 for the api key. 


Refer to the 
FIP API (Simulator)
 pages for more information.


Root API Endpoint


The root API end point is 
http://api.finvu.connecthub/<>
docs.title: Overview

docs.text:
FIP API (Simulator)


For full documentation visit 
mkdocs.org
.


Commands




mkdocs new [dir-name]
 - Create a new project.


mkdocs serve
 - Start the live-reloading docs server.


mkdocs build
 - Build the documentation site.


mkdocs help
 - Print this help message.




Project layout


mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
